#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pin(n) printf("%d\n",n)
typedef long long LL;
using namespace std;
int a[1005];
bool isSubsetSum(int n,int sum)
{

    if(sum==0) return true;
    if(n<0) return false;
    if(sum-a[n]<0) return isSubsetSum(n-1,sum);
    return isSubsetSum(n-1,sum-a[n]) || isSubsetSum(n-1,sum);
}
int main()
{
    int n,sum,t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>n;
    cin>>sum;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>a[i];
    if(isSubsetSum(n-1,sum))
        cout<<"1\n";
    else cout<<"0\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
